message.content:
I need to calculate the depreciation amount in the cash flow statement based on the transactions data provided.

Looking at the data, I need to find all depreciation-related transactions. When examining the transaction types, I see there are specific entries labeled as "Depreciation".

Searching through the data, I found one transaction with the type "Depreciation":

| id | type | date | amount |
|---|---|---|---|
| Depreciation20240101001 | Depreciation | 2024-01-01 | 45745.79 |

This is the only depreciation transaction in the provided data. The amount is 45745.79.

For a cash flow statement, I need to include the total depreciation amount. Since there is only one depreciation transaction, the final depreciation item in the cash flow statement will be 45745.79.

```json
{"solution": {'Depreciation': '45745.79'} }
```
